11#ifndef COMMON_VIDEO_H264_PPS_PARSER_H_
12#define COMMON_VIDEO_H264_PPS_PARSER_H_
13
14#include "absl/types/optional.h"
15
16#if defined(WEBRTC_WEBKIT_BUILD)
17#include <cstdint>
18#endif
19
20namespace rtc {
21class BitBuffer;
22}
23
24namespace webrtc {
25
26// A class for parsing out picture parameter set (PPS) data from a H264 NALU.
27class PpsParser {
28 public:
29 // The parsed state of the PPS. Only some select values are stored.
30 // Add more as they are actually needed.
31 struct PpsState {
32 PpsState() = default;
33
34 bool bottom_field_pic_order_in_frame_present_flag = false;
35 bool weighted_pred_flag = false;
36 bool entropy_coding_mode_flag = false;
37 uint32_t weighted_bipred_idc = false;
38 uint32_t redundant_pic_cnt_present_flag = 0;
39 int pic_init_qp_minus26 = 0;
40 uint32_t id = 0;
41 uint32_t sps_id = 0;
42 };
43
44 // Unpack RBSP and parse PPS state from the supplied buffer.
45 static absl::optional<PpsState> ParsePps(const uint8_t* data, size_t length);
46
47 static bool ParsePpsIds(const uint8_t* data,
48 size_t length,
49 uint32_t* pps_id,
50 uint32_t* sps_id);
51
52 static absl::optional<uint32_t> ParsePpsIdFromSlice(const uint8_t* data,
53 size_t length);
54
55 protected:
56 // Parse the PPS state, for a bit buffer where RBSP decoding has already been
57 // performed.
58 static absl::optional<PpsState> ParseInternal(rtc::BitBuffer* bit_buffer);
59 static bool ParsePpsIdsInternal(rtc::BitBuffer* bit_buffer,
60 uint32_t* pps_id,
61 uint32_t* sps_id);
62};
63
64} // namespace webrtc
65
66#endif // COMMON_VIDEO_H264_PPS_PARSER_H_
67
